sub_fields.label: Override section alignment
sub_fields.name: override_section_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: As the sections are added, the left/right orientation of the content is automatically defined. If you'd like to override this for this section, check this box.

sub_fields.label: Override section background
sub_fields.name: override_section_background
sub_fields.instructions: Each section is assigned an alternating background colour. Depending on the page layout, you may require to change this from the dynamically set setting.

sub_fields.label: Autoplay?
sub_fields.name: autoplay
sub_fields.instructions: Play video as soon as it loads on page

sub_fields.label: Show controls?
sub_fields.name: show_controls
sub_fields.instructions: Provide user with controls to play, pause and scrub the video

sub_fields.label: Loop?
sub_fields.name: loop
sub_fields.instructions: Upon the vide finishing, start the video again.

sub_fields.label: Mute?
sub_fields.name: mute
sub_fields.instructions: Ensure no sound from the video

sub_fields.label: File path
sub_fields.name: file_path
sub_fields.instructions:
This should exclude the extension. At the path provided, there should be 3 versions of the video: MP4, OGV, WEBM. They should all have the same filename before the extensions, ie:
/path/to/file.mp4
/path/to/file.ogv (or .ogg)
/path/to/file.webm

sub_fields.label: Poster
sub_fields.name: poster
sub_fields.instructions: Image to show while video is loading or can't be played
